page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE ...
page.content:
{ A day in the life of a schoolchild.
At 7.45am I hear the curtains being pulled across and my mum turns my television on to t.v.am. I get up,wash and watch the news at 8.ooam while I get dressed. I go downstairs and have my breakfast, normally a glass of fruit juice, a bowl of cornflakes,a slice of toast and a cup of tea. I set of to school at 8.45am and cross the road with the loly-pop lady.I am 11 years old and still go to a junior school. we have four classes and a nursery where children start when they are 3. There are only 7 girls in our class. and our teacher is Mr.Bottom who is the only man teacher in the school. After answering the register we go in to assembly where we listen to stories,sing hymns and say prayers .We
